data.title: Xander Berkeley
data.meta_description: Alexander Harper "Xander" Berkeley (born December 16, 1955, Brooklyn, New York) is an American actor who appeared as Tommy Lowe, manager of Caitlin Davies in the episode "Like a Hurricane", and Metro-Dade Officer Bailey, who was investigating the diner shooting of Sy Rosenthal in the episode...
data.text:
Miami Vice Character

Born

December 16, 1955, Brooklyn, New York

Active

1981-present

Spouse/Children

Sarah Clarke (2002-present), 2 children

Alexander Harper "Xander" Berkeley (born December 16, 1955, Brooklyn, New York) is an American actor who appeared as Tommy Lowe, manager of Caitlin Davies in the episode "Like a Hurricane", and Metro-Dade Officer Bailey, who was investigating the diner shooting of Sy Rosenthal in the episode "Victims of Circumstance" of the series Miami Vice.

Career[]

Berkeley has nearly 200 acting credits on his resume, debuting in the 1981 movie Mommie Dearest, other movie roles include TAG: The Assassination Game (with Perry Lang), The Lawless Land (with Jsu Garcia), The Fabulous Baker Boys (with Albert Hall), Internal Affairs (with Katherine Borowitz and John Kapelos), The Guardian (with Miguel Ferrer), The Rookie (with Tony Plana and Pepe Serna), Terminator 2: Judgment Day (with Joe Morton), Billy Bathgate (with Bruce Willis, Steve Buscemi, and Stanley Tucci), Apollo 13 (with David Andrews and Bill Paxton, Heat (with Martin Ferrero and Mykelti Williamson), Air Force One (with Paul Guilfoyle and Dean Stockwell), Amistad (with Tomas Milian), Drop Dead Sexy (with Pruitt Taylor Vince and Brad Dourif), Small Time (with Garcelle Beauvais), Solace (with Colin Farrell), Proud Mary (with Margaret Avery), and City of Lies (with Keith Szarabajka).

His TV appearances began in M*A*S*H, followed by Hart to Hart, Riptide, Cagney and Lacey, V, The X-Files, 24, CSI: Crime Scene Investigation (with Guilfoyle), Nikita, The Mentalist (episode with Kamala Lopez), Longmire (with Lou Diamond Phillips and Charles S. Dutton), The Walking Dead, and Supergirl.

Personal Life[]
